metadata.name: PUA - Radmin Viewer Utility Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of Radmin which can be abused by an adversary to remotely control Windows machines

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(device.desc) = lower('radmin viewer') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('radmin viewer') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('radmin.exe'))

output.summary: Detects the execution of Radmin which can be abused by an adversary to remotely control Windows machines
